Title: Windows 8 Storage Helper
Description: Windows 8 Storage Helper, helps to Create, Read a Text file and Saves as Image in PictureLibrary.
HomeWiki:
Introduction

Windows 8 Storage Helper, helps you create/read a Text(.txt) file.

Also it can save as image from a given web url.
